channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2023101310
item.description:
Report X-2023101310

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-16
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING DURING SORTATION. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME OFF THE PLASTIC JUG CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023100915
item.description:
Report X-2023100915

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-07
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023100915 SequenceEvent: THE PKG WAS LOCATED IN THE LOAD SIDE DURING THE PRELOAD SORT. DescribePack: THE PLASTIC JERRICAN HAS A HOLE ON THE TOP AND IT CAN'T BE DELIVERED. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PLASTIC JERRICAN WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING. 2. X-2023100923 SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS DAMAGED DURING SORTATION DUE TO POOR HANDLING. DescribePack: THE 5 GALLON PLASTIC DRUM WAS CRACKED ACROSS THE BOTTOM CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PLASTIC DRUM WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023100880
item.description:
Report X-2023100880

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: BELTSVILLE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found damaged package in damage hazmat cage. I repackaged the damage in a salvage drum and submitted all required reports. DescribePack: About 1 quarter of content spilled from loose cap on a container. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a tub and taken to the damage hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023100879
item.description:
Report X-2023100879

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: BELTSVILLE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found the damaged package in damage hazmat cage. The package was repacked in a salvage drum and all required reports filled out. DescribePack: Internal leakage from a loose cap on one the containers. About a quart of content spill onto the other containers. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The wet package was placed in a tub and taken to the damage hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023101252
item.description:
Report X-2023101252

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: UPPER MARLBORO
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was brought to the QA cage from unload area placed inside a tote box because the drum was crushed by the side and the content spilled in the box and tote. package handlers need more orientation about proper handling of hazmat packages generally. DescribePack: The packing box was not strong enough. The drum got split by the side while package handler was attempting to lift. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: package was placed inside a tote box
